meanings: 운전 중의 지시 Stop the car.
아침의 행동을 나타내는 표현 Turn off the alarm.
아침의 행동을 나타내는 표현 Shut off the alarm.

vlive.korean: [초조] 언제 멈춰? [Nervous] When will it stop? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.23
[룰렛이 멈춰 선 곳에는...] 그... [Where the roulette stops] That... 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.23
우진 씨가 말해주세요 - 왜냐면 없는 것 같아가지고 왜 멈춰요? Please say it, Woo Jin. - It seems like you have none. Why are you stopping? 듣기 View video AB6IX : 막방😭😭
vlive.english: Please say it, Woo Jin. - It seems like you have none. Why are you stopping?

vlive.korean: [또 멈춰버린 진의 캐릭터] 왜 멈춰 얘가? [Jin's character stopped again] Why does he stop? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.108
vlive.english: [Jin's character stopped again] Why does he stop?

vlive.korean: 나도 모르겠어, 얘 왜 달리다가 자꾸 멈춰? Me neither. My character stops running. 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.108
vlive.english: Me neither. My character stops running.

examples.korean: The car coasted along until it stopped. 발음듣기 그 승용차는 관성으로 계속 달리다가 멈춰 섰다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The car coasted along until it stopped. 발음

examples.korean: He stopped in the doorway, too timid to go in. 발음듣기 그는 문간에서 멈춰 섰다. 너무 용기가 없어서 들어가지는 못하고. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He stopped in the doorway, too timid to go in. 발음

examples.korean: He slammed on the brakes and the car juddered to a halt. 발음듣기 그가 브레이크를 탁 밟자 차가 요동을 치다가 멈춰 섰다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He slammed on the brakes and the car juddered to a halt. 발음

examples.korean: The truck braked to a halt. 발음듣기 트럭이 속도를 줄이며 멈춰 섰다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The truck braked to a halt. 발음

examples.korean: Hold on! This isn’t the right road. 발음듣기 멈춰! 이 길이 맞는 길이 아냐. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Hold on! This isn’t the right road. 발음
